intro:
A Greedent ambushes you
and steals your party's berries!
title: Absolute Avarice
description:
The Greedent has caught you totally off guard now all your berries are gone!

The Greedent looks like it's about to eat them when it pauses to look at you, interested.

1.label: Battle It
1.tooltip:
(-) Tough Battle
(+) Rewards from its Berry Hoard
1.selected:
The Greedent stuffs its cheeks
and prepares for battle!
1.boss_enraged: Greedent's fierce love for food has it incensed!
1.food_stash: It looks like the Greedent was guarding an enormous stash of food!$@s{item_fanfare}Each Pok√©mon in your party gains 1x Reviver Seed!

2.label: Reason with It
2.selected: Your pleading strikes a chord with the Greedent.$It doesn't give all your berries back, but still tosses a few in your direction.

3.label: Let It Have the Food
3.tooltip:
(-) Lose All Berries
(?) The Greedent Will Like You
3.selected:
The Greedent devours the entire
stash of berries in a flash!$Patting its stomach,
it looks at you appreciatively.$Perhaps you could feed it
